page.title: 17FROM CHAPEL TO WORKSHOP
page.content: On the road to Chester Moor there is a chapel which is being used as a work shop.The Wesleyan chapel is 102 years old.There are 19 people working in it and 16 are employees.They build houses and extensions and are presenly extending the x-ray department of the local hospital.The workforce's day is from 7:45 to 4:30.The owner says that he would like to expand,but regrets that he can't due to expense and feels that his business will remain as it is now.The biggest order at the present is for windows and doors.Everyone appears to enjoy their work in this quiet corner of Chester-le-Street.
